Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Polk
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Polk due to track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Polk due to track condition.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between 54th/Cermak and Damen, and,
  • between Polk and the Loop 'L', only.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

#21 Cermak

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
